content: --चर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (--रा --री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) moving about by night, night stalker. (--रः {1} a fiend, goblin, an evil spirit; <ls>R. 12. 69.</ls> {2} an epithet of Śiva. {3} a jackal. {4} an owl. {5} a snake. {6} the ruddy goose. {7} a thief. (--री {1} a female fiend. {2} a woman going to meet her lover at night by appointment; राममन्मथशरेण ताडिता दुःसहेन हृदये निशाचरी <ls>R. 11. 20</ls> (where the word is used in sense 1 also). {3} a harlot.
